title: Build the Dashboard Page
description: Create a DashboardPage that shows task statistics and recent tasks.
instructions:
Create a DashboardPage component that:
1. Fetches task statistics (total, pending, completed, overdue counts)
2. Shows recent 5 tasks
3. Displays a welcome message with the user's name
4. Has quick links to create a new task and view all tasks

hints.text: Fetch all tasks in useEffect, then calculate statistics client-side by filtering the array.
For overdue tasks, compare new Date(task.dueDate) < new Date() and ensure task.status !== 'COMPLETED'.
